document.title: Example VEX Document Use Case 3 - Multiple statuses

notes.text: The Treck TCP/IP stack before 6.0.1.66 allows Remote Code Execution, related to IPv4 tunneling.
notes.title: CVE description

notes.text: The Treck TCP/IP stack before 5.0.1.35 has an Out-of-Bounds Write via multiple malformed IPv6 packets.
notes.title: CVE description

threats.details: IPv6 is not supported and code is not present.

notes.text: The Treck TCP/IP stack before 6.0.1.66 improperly handles an IPv4/ICMPv4 Length Parameter Inconsistency, which might allow remote attackers to trigger an information leak.
notes.title: CVE description

remediations.details: We are working to integrate the upstream patches in our code.
